buff.description:
Gain a charge of +10 power each time you kill a foe, five if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

name: Chalice of Glory
description: Use this to receive 5,000 PvP rank points.

buff.description: Gain a summoning charge whenever you kill a foe. At 25 charges, you summon a fleshreaver. <c=@reminder>(You lose all charges on down.)</c>
Increase Inflicted Vulnerability Duration: 20%
Increase Inflicted Cripple Duration: 20%

name: Heavenly Medium Bracers
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other medium gloves.

buff.description: Increase Inflicted Weakness Duration: 20%
Increase Inflicted Bleeding Duration: 20%
+7% Critical Chance

name: Cleric's Jewel

buff.description:
+125 Healing
+75 Power
+75 Toughness

description: Double-click to apply to an accessory, amulet, or ring with an unused upgrade slot.

buff.description: Increase Inflicted Poison Duration: 20%
Increase Inflicted Burning Duration: 20%

Gain a charge of +10 condition damage each time you kill a foe, five if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

name: Guild Siege Golem Blueprints
description: Use to construct a guild siege golem build site. It has a lower supply cost than the alpha siege golem. Range 225. Requires 50 supply to complete.

bonuses: +15% might duration; 25% chance when struck to gain might for 5 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 5s)</c>
+20% might duration; +5% damage while under the effects of might.

name: Alpha Siege Golem Blueprints
description: Use to construct an alpha siege golem build site. The siege golem's primary function is to deal heavy damage to gates. Range 225. It is the only mobile siege weapon. Requires 100 supply to complete.

buff.description: Gain 50% of your endurance when you swap to this weapon while in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>

Gain a charge of +10 precision each time you kill a foe, five if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

description: Double-click to access your account bank from anywhere. Reusable.

name: Rampager's Jewel

buff.description:
+125 Precision
+75 Condition Damage
+45 Power
+45 Vitality

description: Double-click to apply to an accessory, amulet, or ring with an unused upgrade slot.

buff.description:
Gain a charge that grants 0.5% outgoing healing effectiveness toward other allies each time you kill a foe, five if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)
Your endurance is refilled each time you kill a foe.

30% Chance on Hit: Inflict Chill (2 Seconds)
(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)
Your next three attacks after swapping to this weapon while in combat have a 100% critical chance. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>

Gain a charge of +10 healing each time you kill a foe, five if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

50% Chance on Critical: Steal Health
(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)
Gain 2 stacks of might (20 seconds) when you swap to this weapon while in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>

50% Chance on Critical: Trigger a Flame Blast for area of effect damage (240 radius).
(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)

Damage nearby foes and chill them for 2 seconds when you swap to this weapon while in combat.
(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)

50% Chance on Critical: Cause a Lightning Strike
(Cooldown: 3 Seconds)
+5% Damage

50% Chance on Critical: Gain Quickness (3 Seconds)
(Cooldown: 30 Seconds)
Increase Inflicted Chill Duration: 20%

name: Trebuchet Blueprints
description: Use to construct a trebuchet build site. The trebuchet's primary function is to deal heavy area damage to walls, or moderate damage to gates. Range 10,000. Requires 100 supply to complete.

name: Ballista Blueprints
description: Use to construct a ballista build site. The ballista's primary function is to deal heavy single target damage to siege equipment and infantry. Range 3,000. Requires 30 supply to complete.

name: Flame Ram Blueprints

buff.description: Your next attack after swapping to this weapon while in combat steals some health. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>
